TopicTitle: What Moon is the most awe-inspiring to you?

Articles.Content: Which one makes you hungry? In love? Makes you just want to crash into it?
The Mun was always fun, but since I started playing with Alternis, my favorite is Laythe.
Laythe, as always...

Vall.

It looks nice even on low settings.
Eeloo is my favorite. Even though its not a moon it was supposed to be. And eeloo just has that feeling that its been cross the world and found its proper place
I second Vall. Laythe is fun due to the atmosphere... but the view from Vall is just awesome.
Vall, Definitely Vall
I like Cal and his dog Napalm.
Minmus... Minmus for sure. Love that moon

Minmus, because it's nearby and yet so alien in comparison to anything we have locally IRL. A large percentage of my missions wind up being to here.

However, I do have end-hopes of getting to Vall eventually, but at the moment I'm at sort of an intermediate point in my KSP career; I went to Bop once, and it took a rescue ship to save the rescue ship before I got the crew home. I need to develop a better Jool tug and higher gravity lander before I attempt it.
Has to be Vall, its surface is cool, and the views are amazing!
I'll go for Pol, the view of Jool and the inner moons is inspiring.
I have to say Laythe, but Ike is like the troll of the Kerbol system.
Tylo. Demands respect. Enough said.
Ike, just because of how easy it's to reach, and then there's that view!'

Tylo. Demands respect. Enough said.

I agree. Great view also. You can drive incredibly fast in those big craters.
for me its the mun, as the correlations between ksp and the apollo program are very satisfying and nostalgic

Stock: Minmus. <3

Alternis: Duna. (It orbits Tylo now)

Planet Factory: Pock. (It's a sub-moon for Kod's sake! )

Pol, defintely Pol!

The view is astounding, you can see all the moons orbiting jool, snd it has these 'poop' shaped rocks haha xD!
Gilly. So low G, so fun.
